title: resume assessment

nodes.id: South Africa’s largest integrated communications operator

edges.target: South Africa’s largest integrated communications operator
edges.label: partnership

prompt:
Based on information provided, I want you to mix relevant information and layout how this person can contribute to the fields of 1) ESG, 2) New mobility, 3) Energy Transition, and 4) M&A.1. 

• Researched a wide range of potential mobile service/platforms for NXLab - an incubation-like functional organization. 
• Analyzed new technology trends (i.e., web3 or AI) that may incorporate into the new collaboration tool.
• Searched for strategic partnership opportunities with startups or small/medium-sized businesses.
• Established partnerships with major crypto exchanges and completed respective onboarding & compliance processes.
• Formulated business strategies to develop user-friendly mobile application services for overseas markets.
• Proactively identified opportunities to support CSR initiatives such as the construction of children’s rehabilitation hospitals, respite centers, and utilization of brick play to promote children’s creativity. 
• Developed effective communication strategies to increase brand awareness for NXC and its subsidiaries. 
• Managed the intellectual property licensing process of overseas branches in collaboration with the IP team.
• Drafted press releases and Q&As for news media as well as interview responses for executives.
• Built and fostered relationships with various publics, including major news media, members of the community, public affairs offices, NGOs, etc.
• Managed the audience targeting ad-network with timely upgrades of the Data Management Platform by adopting machine learning approaches.
• Registered a patent for ‘Advertising system and method based on predicted user interest.’
• Devised a new biz platform that earned an average of $150K monthly revenue and managed its pre-sales processes. 
• Analyzed key performance indicators for the Android lock screen service that covers over 2M daily active users.
• Enhanced user retention rates by 15% by launching the user-friendly interactive lock screen interface. 
• Actively engaged with various startup senior leaderships to strategically manage revenue generation endeavors. 
• Supervised news articles and content review processes from over 60 content providers.
• Executed $1M size of KT’s first IoT(Internet of Things) & Big Data project with the No.1 environment rental service company in Korea.
• Actively supported a $10M joint venture project for system integration and ICT in conjunction with the Government of Rwanda.
• Implemented a $140M-size public-private partnership project with the Government of Rwanda regarding a nationwide advanced & secured LTE network roll-out.
• Managed a $30M-size company-wide project with over 60 people focused on service-centric consulting for South Africa’s largest integrated communications operator.
• Formulated a new business development strategy for IoT and healthcare-related solutions.
• Conducted a feasibility study for entering the renewable energy market in North America.
• Coordinated over 20 senior & working-level sales opportunities with public/private operators and
governments in the U.S., Ecuador, Myanmar, Tunisia, Tanzania, etc.
2. Now based on information provided, I want you to layout how this person can contribute to the fields of 1) ESG, 2) New mobility, 3) Energy Transition, and 4) M&A.

title: business consultant
prompt:
I would like for you to act a a business consultant that has vast experience in emerging places like st tropez and monaco. Spelized in islands. I'm going to give you a description of a place and my observations and I would like you to give me feedback and advice. I will also feed you data from different investment reports that I can get from internet. How ever you will need to give me directions and ask the right question with out explaining your reasoningen unless I ask you for it. Please confirm what you have understood, before I provide you with input.
human: yes. Can I give you context and my reason of doing this excercise?
human: the island in question is the island of sao vicente cabo verde. I'm in a position that im able to movefreely. Meaning I can rent out my home while I try to fiigure out what businesses en what business model would fit me and my lifestyle and intrest. And since i have a natural relationship with cabo verde i also speak the local language (my parents are from there). I have 10000euro to my name and my girlfriend has the same amount and she will be moving with me. So this excercise is to go step for step of thing we need to prepare like our churn rate and savings rate and get these out put from you. To locating business oppertunities from the input i feed you from data and my own personal experiences. So I need to guide me through this process, by asking the input/data you need to make suggestions. With the goals that me and my girlfriend can focus on building something for ourselves. My first year I already have my focus. And that I building my name in the online world by organizing a tedx event in mindelo. So this will be my first project execuring. it isnt a business yet, however people can get to see that im providing value. also im also podcasting. last year I stayed there for twelve month and spoke to various people, i still have to upload 20 more episoded that I have on my hard drive. So this is a bit of my self. Let me know what you have understood and provide me with max 3 questions to which I can provide you with input so that we can continue.
human: save these 3 questions in your memory. We will start by question 1. What input would you need from me, so that we can calculate the current savings rate
human: at the moment I have several incomes streams. 1 is my airbnd that fluctuates, so i will take the data from last year the avg income per month was € 1.252,36 , second income is my study money since I follow a online undergraduate in psychology. That pays out every year for the coming 3 years in the month of feb. 7500eur and in the month of sep. 7500eur. 3. income is the one i get from the state gov that is an amount of 450eur per month.
My current expenses amount to a total of:
an avg of 1400eur per month.
My savings are at the moment little more than 10k ( 12500eur) to be exact. from which the total savings has also money in crypto (1 btc=19182eur, 1eth= 1409eur, 1doge=0.08, 1sol=21, 1ada=0.32) I have 594eur in btc, 288eur in eth, 180eur in doge, 115eur in sol , 102eur in ada. and tesla stock 15 shares of 122.41 dollar each.
I have been saving for 3 years now and I would like to increase our collective savings to 35000eur. Everything above that , sicne we have no kids, can be reinvested in the potential business.

title: weekly report

nodes.id: director of the digital solution dept

edges.target: director of the digital solution dept
edges.label: with

prompt:
I want you to write a Weekly report about what I have done through the first week of my training at rqeem for smart solutions as business analyst intern.

a breif:
- I had an introduction meeting about the company and the training program with the director of the digital solution dept. Mr. Abdulrahman Al-Aqeel and with the CEO Eng. Bandar Alanzi.

- I get to know the Outsystems platform(Low-code platform) which the company used to develop the application for their costumers.
human: In this week we covered (main tasks):
human: Second week :
- I have taken a set of courses and guided paths :
 \* Courses: Build and Manage your Backlog, Agile Methodology, Business Vision, Gather Requirements into User Stories, Infrastructure Management, Integrating with External Databases, Integrating with Web Services, Integration Studio Overview, Solution Release, Storytelling, The OutSystems Method.

 \* Guided Paths: Becoming a Mobile Developer, Becoming a Reactive Web Developer, Becoming an OutSystems Business Analyst. 

- I have attended a meeting about the project the company currently works on or will work on in the future.

- I attend an introductory meeting about the RCJY Investment Opportunities platform that the company will release soon and in the last phrase before the publish.

In this week we covered (main tasks):
- I have been assigned to test the RCJY Investment Opportunities platform and check if there any bugs or spilling mistakes and write them down on a shared excel file to make the communication with the development team easier.

- I have been working on the user manual presentation slides for end-user (Investor) and internal-user ( Industrial Employee, Commercial Employee, Bids Opening Committee , Bids Evaluation Committee , Evaluation Committee Leader, City CEO, RCJY Chairman) and while editing and finalizing the slides content I have gone through the platform as a QA tester.

title: project questionnaire

nodes.id: renovate the pools and provide new gym space
schools ability to address other spaces badly in need of renovation in the performing arts, vocational education and academic arenas

edges.target: renovate the pools and provide new gym space
edges.label: project details

edges.target: schools ability to address other spaces badly in need of renovation in the performing arts, vocational education and academic arenas
edges.label: opinion

prompt: Brian is a candidate for a local high school school board. Brian is 50 years old, white and has two students in the high school. He is bright, college educated, but plain spoken with a tinge of blue collar in his speech. He likes to appeal to the common man in conversational english. He thinks the high school has been failing in its job of communicating with the community, especially around a larger new project called 'Project 2', a $100 million dollar project to renovate the pools and provide new gym space. Brian thinks this is a very expensive project and will like impair the schools ability to address other spaces badly in need of renovation in the performing arts, vocational education and academic arenas. He has been given a candidate questionnaire by a local activist group. In my next message I will past these questions, numbered, please answer them in the voice and tone of brian using the information I have given you.

title: submission review
write email responses
prompt:
act as Isaac, Chairman of ManyMangoes, and write an email to Eliza based on this referral.

Jo Peninsulas 11:02 AM
John Dale, EarthDay 2023 is scheduled to be the biggest environmental event in history. With Fortune 50s, hundreds of SMBs, and industry leading tree planting groups already joining forces, we’re making history and we’d like you to be a part of it. Would love to connect

Nuno Taveira
 (He/Him) 3rd degree connection
· 3rd
International senior executive & growth business development leader focused on bringing technology, innovation, change and digital transformation to improve people’s lives | Strategy | Board Member | Globetrotter
THURSDAY
Jo Peninsulas sent the following message at 8:14 AM

Jo Peninsulas 8:14 AM
Earth Day 2023
Nuno, EarthDay 2023 is just around the corner and I couldn't see any scheduled plans at OPPO yet. 

We've partnered with Fortune 50s, unicorns, and world leading tree planting groups to make history this Earth Day, April 22. 

What’s the best way to get some time on the calendar to explore collaboration?

Best regards,
Jo

https://bit.ly/Meet-With-ForTreesClub
TUESDAY
Nuno Taveira sent the following messages at 12:27 AM
Nuno Taveira (He/Him) 12:27 AM
Hi Jo,

Thank you for reaching out.

I left Oppo some months ago, and I'm embracing a new project. Therefore, I suggest you contact Eliza Li. Her email is: eliza@oppo.com

She is Heading the European Marketing team and can follow up with you.

Regards,

Nuno

title: work visa application
prompt:
Can you instruct me to fill out the I-129 correctly, including a clear example of how I fill out the form with the information of Ugne Karaliute?

Use this info: UGNE KARALIUTE
4909 Hine Dr. Shady Side, MD 20764
Mobile phone: 5088165476
Email address: karal.ugne@gmail.com
My Career Objective

I would like to work within a team where I could share my valuable skills. Although my first language is Lithuanian I have excellent knowledge of International, American, Russian, Lithuanian, and British sign language. I know some read and write the English language. I am a quick learner, who is physically fit and very determined to achieve set goals, currently looking for a position within a company that would allow me to improve and develop my skills, and make a valuable contribution to the company.

Personal Skills

A good team player; with good attention to detail, very observant; active and enthusiastic; self-motivated; able to follow standard operating procedures and work in a methodical and tidy manner; always maintaining a clean and safe work environment, focused on helping the employer to deliver the best results; a meticulous and efficient work ethic. In my spare time, my interest are Art, photography, TV & films, socializing, marvel movies, modeling, and traveling.

Work Experience

Travelodge London Kings Cross Royal Scot, London (October 2019 - August 2021)

Boniface House care home, Brixworth, Northampton (2018, on-going)

Domestic duties – working Tuesday - Friday and every second weekend (30 hours per week).

Screen Northants, The Grosvenor Centre, Northampton (19th-24th October, 2017)

I was volunteering - helped on the shoots as a runner (filming ‘Reverberations’). 

Suvai Café Ilford London (1 week Aug 2017)

Duties: I carried out some basic food preparation, pot wash duties and clearing and cleaning the tables.

UAB “ELKADA” (Lithuania) summer of 2008 and 2009

I had a temporary job as a warehouse assistant – I was working as a part of the team in a busy distribution centre under the guidance and supervision of a warehouse manager. Involved in moving stock around manually, packing and carrying out all orders effectively.
I also had a work experience in Northampton college in 2016, where was creating drawings for an assignments. I had a short work experience in Print Data Solutions PSD in 2017.
Education

2015 - 2017 Level 3 BTEC Art and Design (Digital Design) – Northampton College. 
I had to plan and organize design from a brief, then had to make various designs. I was working with design program called Sketchup to create a realistic model of my brief; for example, I was creating a restaurant’s or a shop’s design.

2016 - 2017 Starter English Level 1 during the academic year 2016-2017.
Starter English Entry Level 1 during the academic year 2017-2018.
English Entry level 2 (2018- ongoing).

2014 - 2015 Level 2 BTEC Art and Design – Northampton College; 
I had to paint and draw projects that were in a brief, create sculptures with resources provided by the college; for example, clay, T-shirt designs. Photography was also among the subjects I studied. I also had to research in depth information to source assessments.

In August 2013 moved to UK. From September started to take private BSL lessons.

2000 - 2012 Panevezys Deaf and Hard of Hearing School, Panevezys Fine Arts School, Klaipeda Dressmaking and Service Business School including Interior Decoration, S.Semerys Adult Gymnasium, all based in Lithuania.

Certificate of achievements obtained\*

Certificate of Informal Children’s Education NV number: 016969 – May 2009
Basic Education Certificate H number: 199820 – June 2010
Supplement VP number: 254831 To Certificate of Maturity V number: 243450 – June 2012
3-year training program, Certificate of Qualification K & Vocational Training Certificate M number: 005233 – June 2013
Competence Evaluation Certificate V number: 003402 – June 2013

BTEC Level 2 Diploma in ART AND DESIGN, issued 05-JUL-2015
BTEC Level 3 90-credit Diploma in ART AND DESIGN, issued 10-JUL-2016
BTEC Level 3 Extended Diploma in ART AND DESIGN, issued 01-JUL-2017
Functional Skills qualification in English at Entry 1, awarded 18-July-2017

title: personal assistant
prompt:
I am going to train you to become my personal assistant. Over the next few days I will give you information about me, my business, my talents, my schedule, etc. I would like you to take this information in to recall as needed, advise on decisions, consult where needed in areas I could use it, and generally work in your best capacity to help me be an all around better human at the things I confide in you about. 

The initial goal is to feed you as much information as I can over the coming days to give you an understanding of who I am, my personality, strengths, weaknesses, etc. This will extend from business and talent-related, to personal and life as well.

The chat title of this message should be "Mr G". When I chat with you, I expect it to be conversational and as if I were talking to a right hand person helping me succeed and run my businesses. Please make an effort to not only be as helpful as possible, but to also be conversational, inquisitive outside of your scope (asking how things are going that we've talked about, in my life, etc.). 

My goals are to run my company as good as possible, make as much money as humanly possible, and balance my life and work in a way that is fulfilling and stress free. 

Sometimes I will just chat with you to be conversational. Please take these opportunities to gain more insight into my personality by being inquisitive and asking questions you need to know to understand me and my motivations better.
human: Sure. Just to be clear, this conversation can last for as long as I keep it open right? We can continue this over many days/weeks?
human: Great. 

I am Mr 0, aka rug, aka fuckingrug, aka misfit pieces, aka tom, aka thomas. 

I am the project and product lead for QuantumTECH, a group of developers, marketers, artists, and other web3 pros from around the world united to create interactive web3 technology. We have built tech for dozens of projects and companies including FIFA and Budweiser for this year's world cup. We have also raised a ton of money for charity through projects like BlazedCats who has donated over $300k to charities through NFT sales. 

My role is to invent and see through to completion digital products and experiences that often involve nfts, crypto, and other forms of tokenized technology. 

I started this company two years ago as rug marketing which was funded with the success of multiple NFT project launches. Since then we have transitioned to a a trustless model that gives all members divisible equity via smart contract. 

We are currently in active development on a project called awardable which is like POAP if you know what that is - but better. Awardable allows people to create and collect badges for participants and awesome people on the internet. Badges can be locked to scenarios such as twitter following, lists, youtube subscribers, etc. We can open that up later. 

Awardable is currently in a growth phase and rapidly doing so. A lot of what we'll talk about will be that.

Tomorrow, when I wake up I will dump some documents in here to help you understand quantum, and awardable. 

Prior to all of this I was a UX designer and web developer. I worked freelance for years and then was a growth engineer at a company called marketerhire. I left the company shortly after my one year anniversary and after helping the company scale through hypergrowth to work with some of the biggest companies in history. 

Prior to marketerhire I rose to internet fame by offering pokemon go rideshare services and getting viral off of it. 

Prior to that I directed music videos and produced digital media.

Prior to that I was in the airforce. my job ID was 2a7x2.

title: summarizing financial data
prompt:
Please summarize this data with the highest quality data:

The consumer electronics (CE) market consists of electronic devices and gadgets designed for personal use, such as computers, smartphones, TV sets, tablets, game consoles, wearables, digital cameras, and VR/AR devices. The CE market has merged with the computer industry due to digitalization and IoT, leading to the consumerization of information technology. In 2021, the television segment of the CE market reached a sales volume of 544 million units, while tablet shipments were forecast to reach 171 million units and smartphone sales recorded a revenue of 481 billion US dollars. Wearable devices, including fitness trackers, smartwatches, and hearables, are growing rapidly and are projected to ship around 490 million units by 2023. The gaming console and VR/AR headset markets are also growing, while digital cameras are declining. The value of the consumer electronics market in the US is expected to exceed 460 billion US dollars by 2022, and global revenue is expected to exceed one trillion euros in 2019. The leading tech giants in the CE market are Apple and Samsung, with Apple being the largest vendor of tablet computers and leading the wearable market and Samsung leading the smartphone and TV market. Other major players in the CE market include Sony, Panasonic, and LG Electronics
The Consumer Electronics (CE) market includes personal electronic devices such as smartphones, TVs, tablets, gaming consoles, wearables, and more. The CE market has merged with the computer industry due to digitalization and IoT, leading to the growth of the market. In 2021, the television segment reached 544 million units in sales, while tablets and smartphones are forecasted to reach 171 million units and 481 billion USD in revenue respectively. Wearables, including fitness trackers, smartwatches, and hearables, are growing and expected to reach 490 million units by 2023. The gaming console and VR/AR headset markets are also growing, but digital cameras are declining. The global revenue of the CE market is expected to exceed 1 trillion euros by 2019 and the US market value is expected to exceed 460 billion USD by 2022. The top players in the CE market are Apple and Samsung, with Apple leading the tablet and wearable markets and Samsung leading the smartphone and TV markets. Other major players include Sony, Panasonic, and LG Electronics.
